getmedia.Media¶

class Media¶

Bases: object

An abstract Base class to acquire and maintain media from internet.

Parameters

CWD (string) – Current working directory path

__init__()¶

Construct method.

Methods

__init__()

Construct method.

checkDirElseCreate(folderName)

Check if directory exist, create it if it does not.

dlIG(path, url)

Download Instagram media from given URL and save to given Path.

dlYT(path, url)

Download Youtube and Twitter media from given URL and save to given Path.

processMedia(pathYT, pathIG, *url)

Input URLs to respected methods and save them in given paths.
checkDirElseCreate(folderName)¶

Check if directory exist, create it if it does not.

dlIG(path, url)¶

Download Instagram media from given URL and save to given Path.

Parameters

  • path (string) – Path for the file to be saved

  • url (string) – URL of the media to be downloaded

dlYT(path, url)¶

Download Youtube and Twitter media from given URL and save to given Path.

Parameters

  • path (string) – Path for the file to be saved

  • url (string) – URL of the media to be downloaded

processMedia(pathYT, pathIG, *url)¶

Input URLs to respected methods and save them in given paths.

Parameters

  • pathYT (string) – Download path of Youtube and Twitter URLs

  • pathIG (string) – Download path of Instagram URLs

  • url (List of string) – Variable length argument list of URLs
